option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
files are in the map format.
filename of the cnvmap format file. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Creates an index of a cnvmap format file.

description.p: Creates an index of a cnvmap format file.
The index is written to standard output.
Index files cannot be created for map format files with this utility.

example.description: Create an index file for the cnvmap format file "20040830.cnvmap". The index is writen to the file "20040830.cnvinx".
